Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Authorizing the transfer of memberships for certain members of the New York state and local police and fire retirement system to the New York state and local employees' retirement system
Summary: Authorizes the transfer of memberships for certain members of the New York state and local police and fire retirement system who previously held a membership with the New York state and local employees' retirement system back to such retirement system.
LawCode: Amd ยง384-d, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to authorizing the transfer of memberships for certain members of the New York state and local police and fire retirement system to the New York state and local employees' retirement system
